Trade/Device Name(s): VITROS XT Chemistry Products GLU-Ca Slides
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITROS XT Chemistry Products GLU-Ca Slides measuring glucose and calcium in multiple specimen types using colorimetric detection on VITROS XT 7600 Integrated System
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro diagnostic use only; quantitatively measures glucose (GLU) in serum, plasma, urine, and CSF, and calcium (Ca) in serum, plasma, and urine to aid in diagnosis and treatment of disorders including diabetes, hypoglycemia, parathyroid disease, bone disease, and tetany
